summary: A command‑line utility that runs a pre‑trained VAD model to produce frame‑level speech/non‑speech predictions using either a sliding‑window or overlapping‑segment approach, applies smoothing, and post‑processes the results into speech segment timestamps or RTTM manifests.
business_intent: Enable users to automatically detect and extract speech regions from audio collections for evaluation, data preparation, or downstream ASR and diarization workflows.
